setting.label: Source Media Folder 1
setting.help: Select the first folder where your media files are located (e.g., cloud drive mount point). Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Exclude folders for Source 1 (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning for Source 1. (e.g., Movies,Shows,Standup)

setting.label: Source Media Folder 2
setting.help: Select the second folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Exclude folders for Source 2 (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning for Source 2.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 3
setting.help: Select the third folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Exclude folders for Source 3 (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning for Source 3.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 4
setting.help: Select the fourth folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Exclude folders for Source 4 (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning for Source 4.

setting.label: Source Media Folder 5
setting.help: Select the fifth folder for your media files. Leave blank if not used.

setting.label: Exclude folders for Source 5 (comma separated)
setting.help: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude from scanning for Source 5.

setting.label: Output Folder for STRM Links
setting.help: Choose where the generated .strm files (media links/playlists) will be stored.

setting.label: Included File Extensions
setting.help: Comma-separated list of file extensions to include in scans (e.g., .mp4,.mkv).

setting.label: Scan Subfolders (Recursive)
setting.help: Enable to scan through all subfolders within the source media folders.

setting.label: Recursive Scan Depth Limit
setting.help: Set the maximum depth for recursive scanning (0 for unlimited).

setting.label: Minimum File Size (MB)
setting.help: Only include files larger than this size in megabytes (0 for no limit).

setting.label: Exclude Hidden Files/Folders
setting.help: Do not include files or folders that start with a '.' (dot).

setting.label: Enable Adult Content Filter
setting.help: When enabled, content matching adult keywords will be categorized separately.

setting.label: Adult Content Keywords (comma separated)
setting.help: Keywords in filenames to identify adult content for separate handling.

setting.label: Adult Category Folder Name
setting.help: The name of the folder where adult content STRM links will be stored. (e.g., Adult, Private)

setting.label: Default Category Behavior
setting.help: How to categorize files not matching specific rules.
setting.lvalues: Categorize by Parent Folder Name|Place in 'Filename Only' Category|Place in '_' Category

setting.label: Default Download Path
setting.help: Where files will be downloaded when 'Direct Download' is used.

setting.label: Enable Direct Download
setting.help: Adds a context menu option to directly download video files.

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Words to Remove
setting.help: Words to remove from downloaded filenames for display.

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Words to Replace (old=new)
setting.help: Replace words in downloaded filenames (e.g., 720p=HD).

setting.label: Downloaded Filename: Enable Regex Replace
setting.help: Use a regular expression to modify downloaded filenames.

setting.label: Downloaded Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regular expression pattern to match in downloaded filenames.

setting.label: Downloaded Regex Replace With
setting.help: Replacement string for the downloaded regex pattern.

setting.label: Adult Content Download Path
setting.help: Dedicated download path for adult content, if filter is enabled.

setting.label: Adult Content Remove Words (pipe-separated)
setting.help: Words (pipe-separated) to remove from adult content filenames.

setting.label: Adult Content Switch Words (old=new|...)
setting.help: Words to replace in adult content filenames.

setting.label: Use Adult Regex Replace
setting.help: Enable regex for advanced adult content filename replacement.

setting.label: Adult Regex Pattern
setting.help: Regex pattern to search for in adult content filenames.

setting.label: Adult Regex Replace With
setting.help: String to replace matched regex pattern with in adult content filenames.

setting.label: Show 'Quick Scan' in Main Menu
setting.help: Adds a 'Quick Scan (No Playlist)' option to the main menu for quick folder content review without creating a playlist.

setting.label: Logging Level
setting.help: Sets the verbosity of logging messages (0=Debug, 1=Info, 2=Warning, 3=Error, 4=None).
